DOC.brief_summary: This pilot human experimental study evaluate whether use e-cigarette affect lung function , exhale CO level , quantitative tobacco cigarette consumption active tobacco smoker . Subjects recruit Winchester Chest Clinic ( WCC ) , Adult Primary Care Clinic ( PCC ) Smilow Cancer Hospital Smoking Cessation Service randomize 1 2 group : ( 1 ) nicotine patch intensive counseling ( standard care ) plus nicotine e-cigarette ; ( 2 ) nicotine patch intensive counseling plus non-nicotine e-cigarette .

DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Smoking 1 tobacco cigarette per day . Residence within reasonable drive distance New Haven.. Exclusion : Unstable psychiatric condition suicidal ideation , acute psychosis , severe alcohol dependence , dementia . Unstable medical condition require hospitalization . Acute myocardial infarction acute cerebrovascular accident within past 30 day . Unstable angina . History allergic reaction adhesive .
